input.job_description:
Role Overview
We are seeking experienced legal professionals to join a new research initiative focused on enhancing the reasoning and analytical capabilities of next-generation legal systems. Participants will help design, evaluate, and refine complex legal workflows and case-based content.

Key Responsibilities
- Develop and review realistic legal scenarios, case studies, and documentation.
- Draft and analyze legal-style prompts, briefs, memos, and responses.
- Evaluate content for accuracy, clarity, and adherence to legal standards.
- Collaborate with a small team to iterate and ensure rigorous project quality.

Ideal Qualifications
- 3+ years of professional legal experience at a top law firm or in-house corporate environment.
- Licensed to practice law in the U.S. or Canada.
- Strong expertise in legal research, drafting, and analysis across corporate law, litigation, or regulatory compliance.
- Excellent written communication skills and exceptional attention to detail.
- Ability to collaborate effectively and adapt to evolving project goals.

Work Details
- Fully remote and asynchronous — flexible work environment.
- Independent contractor arrangement.

Compensation: $90–$110/hour USD (with performance bonuses up to $100/hour)
